p: PH and P95 at 50 μg/ml gave the highest %inhibition of TNF- α production (64.79% ± 0.26 and 60.46% ± 3.07, respectively) which were significantly different ( p-value < 0.001) from prednisolone at 50 μg/ml (89.00% ± 0.70) as the same as other extracts at 100 μg/ml which gave the highest %inhibition of TNF- α production which were significantly different ( p value < 0.001) from prednisolone at 50 μg/ml ( Figure 3).
